thread.title: What does it mean to be a Reuters visual journalist?

title: What does it mean to be a Reuters visual journalist?
text:
What does it mean to be a Reuters visual journalist? 7:51pm IST - 06:47 
Reuters visual journalists are renowned for preserving integrity, independence, and freedom from bias when capturing events that shape the world in which we live. Hear from Zohra Bensemra, Natalie Thomas and Antonio Denti on what it means to be Reuters visual journalist. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Reuters visual journalists are renowned for preserving integrity, independence, and freedom from bias when capturing events that shape the world in which we live.
